Title: Averardo Vault Important Notice (1)
Text:
The following is restricted to employees with Level 1 clearance or higher:

The Precious Metals and Artworks Depository is the first depository of the Averardo Vault, responsible for the safekeeping of precious metals and rare artworks.

Each section has security rooms, with the top-level security control room in the artwork section holding the highest clearance.

Monthly reports on the quantity and volume of items in the precious metals section must be recorded to ensure proper tracking of any losses.

Maintain environmental conditions (e.g., temperature, humidity) within acceptable ranges.

Do not examine certain items to avoid potential mental impacts.

To avoid misunderstandings among individuals with particular beliefs, do not remove coverings from specific items in the artwork section under any circumstances!
